text:
Hi <@U07QSFL8B5Y>

Maybe I can help. Please see the below:

First go to *Templates*, and select *Design Tools*. This is where all your page templates, including headers and footers, are stored.
Find the template that's linked to the page you want to update for your private content. Once you're in the right template, look for the section with the logo, usually under `<header>` or `<div class="header">` tags.
Look for an `<img>` tag that has the current logo's URL. To change the logo, replace the URL in that `<img>` tag with the URL of the new logo (you can upload the new logo to your HubSpot file manager).

Let me know if this works or not. Thanks!
